question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the center of the tarmac. Are you in view at the current location? If the center of the tarmac is not within your field of view, what is the most relevant object in the field of view? Where is the object?  
choose:  
A. I cannot see the center of the apron, but there is the facade of a low-rise building on the right side of my view.  
B. I can see the center of the apron within my field of view.  
C. I cannot see the center of the apron, but there is a bus stop in the lower left corner of my field of view.  
D. I cannot see the center of the apron, but there is a section of highway in the lower right corner of my field of view.  
E. I cannot see the center of the helipad, but there is a helipad on the roof of a high-rise building in the center of my view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The initial view shows a helipad on the roof of a high-rise building in the center of the field of view, indicating that the center of the tarmac (helipad) is visible. Therefore, option E is the most accurate description of the scene.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 1)]
Option: [E]
Reason: The question asks about navigating to the center of the tarmac. The initial view (0-1s) shows a helipad on the roof of a high-rise building in the center of the view. Therefore, the most relevant object is the helipad, and option E is the most accurate description. The provided answer is correct.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The initial view shows a helipad on the roof of a high-rise building in the center of the field of view, indicating that the center of the tarmac (helipad) is visible. Therefore, option E is the most accurate description of the scene.
